kcprtGeneralTable.name: kcprtGeneralTable
kcprtGeneralTable.description: This table contains the generic parameters that is applied to the KYOCERA network printer.

kcprtGeneralEntry.name: kcprtGeneralEntry
kcprtGeneralEntry.description: A list of general entries for KYOCERA printer.

kcprtOptionDescription.name: kcprtOptionDescription
kcprtOptionDescription.description: The string used for identify the option interface.

kcprtKpdlLevel.name: kcprtKpdlLevel
kcprtKpdlLevel.description: The level of KPDL. The value (0) means KPDL is not supported or KPDL ROM is missing.

kcprtSystemUpTime.name: kcprtSystemUpTime
kcprtSystemUpTime.description: The amount of time since this printer was last powered on. Unit is second.

kcprtBinNumber.name: kcprtBinNumber
kcprtBinNumber.description: The number of paper bins that is implemented within printer itself. This number does not show all of input bin number.

kcprtCardSlotCapacity.name: kcprtCardSlotCapacity
kcprtCardSlotCapacity.description: The number of IC card slots that this printer actually has. The value (0) means this printer has no IC card slot.

kcprtRomSlotCapacity.name: kcprtRomSlotCapacity
kcprtRomSlotCapacity.description: The number of option ROM slots. The value (0) means this printer has no option ROM slot.

kcprtSimmSlotCapacity.name: kcprtSimmSlotCapacity
kcprtSimmSlotCapacity.description: The number of SIMM slots that this printer actually has.

kcprtSimmSlotUsed.name: kcprtSimmSlotUsed
kcprtSimmSlotUsed.description: The number of SIMM slots that is currently used for SIMM.

kcprtOriginalMemorySize.name: kcprtOriginalMemorySize
kcprtOriginalMemorySize.description: The amount of memory that this printer has on its controller board. Note this value does not include any other optional memory. Unit is kilobytes.

kcprtTotalMemorySize.name: kcprtTotalMemorySize
kcprtTotalMemorySize.description: The amount of memory that this printer actually has. Unit is kilobytes.

kcprtUserMemorySize.name: kcprtUserMemorySize
kcprtUserMemorySize.description: The amount of memory that is available for user. Unit is kilobyte.

kcprtVirtualMemory.name: kcprtVirtualMemory
kcprtVirtualMemory.description: This object shows whether this printer has the virtual memory function.

kcprtPageMemorySize.name: kcprtPageMemorySize
kcprtPageMemorySize.description: The page memory size corresponding to the FRPO R5 parameter. Because each model of our printer has slightly different value combination, it is recommended to verify the value after writing. Please ask to KYOCERA about the value combination for each printer. For example, our A3 type printer does not have this capability so that The value will be always 512KB(3). The value (-1) means others. Writing (-1) has no meaning.

kcprtHostBufferSize.name: kcprtHostBufferSize
kcprtHostBufferSize.description: The host buffer size in units of ten kilobytes. The value(0) means that the host buffer size is 5 Kbytes.

kcprtHostBuffer1stRate.name: kcprtHostBuffer1stRate
kcprtHostBuffer1stRate.description: The ratio of the main host buffer size.

kcprtHostBuffer2ndRate.name: kcprtHostBuffer2ndRate
kcprtHostBuffer2ndRate.description: The ratio of the 2nd host buffer size.

kcprtHostBuffer3rdRate.name: kcprtHostBuffer3rdRate
kcprtHostBuffer3rdRate.description: The ratio of the 3rd host buffer size. Note that this entry will be 'not accessible' if the printer has only two interfaces.

kcprtHostBufferOption.name: kcprtHostBufferOption
kcprtHostBufferOption.description: In the automatic mode, the first data arriving from the computer go into main buffer (1st buffer). In the fixed mode, each buffer is fixed on the appropriate interface. Refer to Users manual.

kcprtBufferXoffLevel.name: kcprtBufferXoffLevel
kcprtBufferXoffLevel.description: The printer will pause for receiving data when the ratio of occupied data on the host buffer reaches this threshold level. Note that this value should be larger than kcprtBufferXonLevel. If not, the value is ignored.

kcprtBufferXonLevel.name: kcprtBufferXonLevel
kcprtBufferXonLevel.description: The printer will begin to receive data again when the ratio of occupied data on the host buffer becomes lower than this threshould level. Note that value should be less than kcprtBufferXoffLevel. If not, the value is ignored.

kcprtFFTimeout.name: kcprtFFTimeout
kcprtFFTimeout.description: The form-feed time-out timer in units of five seconds. The value (0) means the time-out timer is off.

kcprtSleepTimer.name: kcprtSleepTimer
kcprtSleepTimer.description: The value of sleep timer in units of five minutes. The value (0) means the sleep timer is off.

kcprtWakeupStatusPage.name: kcprtWakeupStatusPage
kcprtWakeupStatusPage.description: If enable, a printer generates the status page each time it comes up.

kcprtOnlineControl.name: kcprtOnlineControl
kcprtOnlineControl.description: This object controls the on/off line status. Note the writing value does not apply in some situation.

kcprtCpuTable.name: kcprtCpuTable
kcprtCpuTable.description: Information of CPU that is implemented in the printer.

kcprtCpuEntry.name: kcprtCpuEntry
kcprtCpuEntry.description: A list of CPU information for KYOCERA printer.

kcprtCpuIndex.name: kcprtCpuIndex
kcprtCpuIndex.description: A unique value used by the printer to identify CPU on the printers controller.

kcprtCpuName.name: kcprtCpuName
kcprtCpuName.description: The CPU model name, such as 68EC040.

kcprtCpuClock.name: kcprtCpuClock
kcprtCpuClock.description: The clock speed of CPU in unit of MHz.

kcprtCpuRole.name: kcprtCpuRole
kcprtCpuRole.description: The role of this CPU. The value (-1) means others.

kcprtFirmwareVersion.name: kcprtFirmwareVersion
kcprtFirmwareVersion.description: The version string for the firmware of this CPU.

kcprtFirmwareUpdata.name: kcprtFirmwareUpdata
kcprtFirmwareUpdata.description: Shows whether this firmware can be updated on the controller.

kcprtOutputTable.name: kcprtOutputTable
kcprtOutputTable.description: This table contains the basic part of the output unit. The main purpose is to control SO-6.

kcprtOutputEntry.name: kcprtOutputEntry
kcprtOutputEntry.description: A list of information for the output unit, especially for the SO-6.

kcprtOutputIndex.name: kcprtOutputIndex
kcprtOutputIndex.description: The value of the prtOutputIndex of this printer that this entry is associated with.

kcprtOutputMode.name: kcprtOutputMode
kcprtOutputMode.description: The operation mode of the sorter. If this device does not support the sorter function, the reading value is (-1) and all writing are ignored. Also, writing value (-1) does not take effect.

kcprtOutputMultiMode.name: kcprtOutputMultiMode
kcprtOutputMultiMode.description: In the multiple mode, the sorter can simultaneously be used by different computers. Each computer may assign its own output trays. This value determines how the tray is selected. The value (-1) means others or 'not supported'.

kcprtOutputGroupNumber.name: kcprtOutputGroupNumber
kcprtOutputGroupNumber.description: This entry shows how many groups are existing on the output device.

kcprtOutputDefaultGroup.name: kcprtOutputDefaultGroup
kcprtOutputDefaultGroup.description: The value of the kcprtTrayGroupIndex corresponding to the current output tray group in a sorter. This value has no meaning if this output unit is not a soter. The value (0) means that the multiple mode is disabled and all of trays will be able to use. Writing value (0) indicates a selection of bulkTray . Writing is only allowed when the multiple mode is enabled.

kcprtOutputBulkStatus.name: kcprtOutputBulkStatus
kcprtOutputBulkStatus.description: This entry shows current status of the bulk tray. Since the bulk tray of SO-6 has only a full sensor, this entry has only two states. In future, the state will be added.

kcprtOutputTrayMaxCapacity.name: kcprtOutputTrayMaxCapacity
kcprtOutputTrayMaxCapacity.description: This entry shows how many pages the tray on this output device can hold. Unit is sheet.

kcprtTrayGroupTable.name: kcprtTrayGroupTable
kcprtTrayGroupTable.description: The concept of Group is for the multiple computer environment. These contents take effect when kcprtOutputMultiMode is enable. For further information, refer to the sorter manual. Note in case of off (0), the access to this content is ineffective.

kcprtTrayGroupEntry.name: kcprtTrayGroupEntry
kcprtTrayGroupEntry.description: A list of information about the tray group on the multiple tray device.

kcprtTrayGroupIndex.name: kcprtTrayGroupIndex
kcprtTrayGroupIndex.description: The unique value used by the printer to identify each tray groups. Note that this value will be changed while the printer power cycles if Prescribe ASTK command is issued.

kcprtTrayGroupBeginIndex.name: kcprtTrayGroupBeginIndex
kcprtTrayGroupBeginIndex.description: The value of the kcprtOutputTrayIndex corresponding to the tray that is assigned as the begining of this group.

kcprtTrayGroupEndIndex.name: kcprtTrayGroupEndIndex
kcprtTrayGroupEndIndex.description: The value of the kcprtOutputTrayIndex corresponding to the tray that is assigned as the end of this group. This index is automatically assigned by the printer when the group is created. Please refer to thePrescribe manual for detailed information.

kcprtOutputTrayTable.name: kcprtOutputTrayTable
kcprtOutputTrayTable.description: Note in case of off (0), the access to this content is ineffective.

kcprtOutputTrayEntry.name: kcprtOutputTrayEntry
kcprtOutputTrayEntry.description: A list of information about the individual tray.

kcprtOutputTrayIndex.name: kcprtOutputTrayIndex
kcprtOutputTrayIndex.description: The unique value used by a printer to identify each trays. Values are expected to remain stable across successive printer power cycle. This contents has no meaning except for a sorter device.

kcprtOutputTrayOrder.name: kcprtOutputTrayOrder
kcprtOutputTrayOrder.description: The output order for trays. The beginning number is (1) and the last number should be equal to the maximum tray number. When the multiple mode is available, the order in the appropriate group is determined by this entry. The number should be unique and continuous in one group or the whole if the group function is disabled. The value (0) means the order has not been determined. In case all of the trays are not determined, the sorter will operate in default settings. About default settings, refer to the sorters manual. Currently this entry is read-only.

kcprtOutputTrayGroup.name: kcprtOutputTrayGroup
kcprtOutputTrayGroup.description: The value of kcprtTrayGroupIndex corresponding to the group that this tray is assigned to. The value (0) means this tray is not assigned to a group or the multiple mode is disable.

kcprtOutputTrayCount.name: kcprtOutputTrayCount
kcprtOutputTrayCount.description: The count of page that the tray may be holding. Since the tray cannot count the page that it has currently, the value is not always same as the actual page counts. If all of paper is removed, this value will be 0. In SO-6, there is no full sensor. So, if the application needs to know whether the tray is full or not, the application should compare this value with OutputTrayMaxCapacity. In some case, the printer is turned on with remaining some pages on the tray for example, this value will be same as MaxCapacity to inform that paper is remaining and demand to remove the page.

kcprtMarkerTable.name: kcprtMarkerTable
kcprtMarkerTable.description: This table contains some useful entries to control the marker specific function.

kcprtMarkerEntry.name: kcprtMarkerEntry
kcprtMarkerEntry.description: A list of entries that corresponds each function of the marker.

kcprtMarkerIndex.name: kcprtMarkerIndex
kcprtMarkerIndex.description: The value of the prtMarkerIndex of the printer devices with which it is associated.

kcprtMarkerKirLevel.name: kcprtMarkerKirLevel
kcprtMarkerKirLevel.description: The value that shows current KIR level. The value (0) means off or not support (0).

kcprtMarkerEcoprintLevel.name: kcprtMarkerEcoprintLevel
kcprtMarkerEcoprintLevel.description: The value that shows current Ecoprint level. The value (0) means off or not support.

kcprtMarkerAddressabilityFeedDirDeclared.name: kcprtMarkerAddressabilityFeedDirDeclared
kcprtMarkerAddressabilityFeedDirDeclared.description: This object provides the value of the declared addressability, in the feed direction, of this marker. This addressability is measured in prtMarkerAddressabilityUnit.

kcprtMarkerAddressabilityXFeedDirDeclare.name: kcprtMarkerAddressabilityXFeedDirDeclared
kcprtMarkerAddressabilityXFeedDirDeclare.description: This object provides the value of declared dimension, in the cross feed direction, of this marker device. This addressability is measured in prtMarkerAddressabilityUnit.

kcprtMarkerAddressablilityFeedDirChosen.name: kcprtMarkerAddressablilityFeedDirChosen
kcprtMarkerAddressablilityFeedDirChosen.description: The value of the addressability, in the feed direction, chosen by the printer. If the printer supports the declared addressability, this addressability is the same as the declared addressability. If not, this addressability is set to the closest addressability that the printer supports when the declared dimension is set.

kcprtMarkerAddressablilityXFeedDirChosen.name: kcprtMarkerAddressablilityXFeedDirChosen
kcprtMarkerAddressablilityXFeedDirChosen.description: The value of the addressability, in the cross feed direction, chosen by the printer. If the printer supports the declared addressability, this addressability is the same as the declared addressability. If not, this addressability is set to the closest addressability that the printer supports when the declared dimension is set.

kcprtChannelTable.name: kcprtChannelTable
kcprtChannelTable.description: This table control's HEX dump function.

kcprtChannelIndex.name: kcprtChannelIndex
kcprtChannelIndex.description: The value of the prtChannelIndex of the printer device that this prtChannelEntry is associated with.

kcprtChannelFunction.name: kcprtChannelFunction
kcprtChannelFunction.description: The current state of the function of this channel. KYOCERA printer can set the hex dump mode to interface (channel). Writing affects all interface(channel).This setting is only valid for one job. After processing the job, this entry automatically returns through(0).

kcprtMemoryDeviceTable.name: kcprtMemoryDeviceTable
kcprtMemoryDeviceTable.description: This table contains information for each memory device, such as the IC-Card.

kcprtMemoryDeviceEntry.name: kcprtMemoryDeviceEntry
kcprtMemoryDeviceEntry.description: A list of entries that are corresponding to the each function of the memory device.

kcprtMemoryDeviceIndex.name: kcprtMemoryDeviceIndex
kcprtMemoryDeviceIndex.description: A unique value that is corresponding to each memory device, such as IC-Card. The value assignment will change if the IC-Card is removed or inserted.

kcprtMemoryDeviceLocation.name: kcprtMemoryDeviceLocation
kcprtMemoryDeviceLocation.description: The value shows the location of this memory device. Note that if the location is download area, only the resource that has been assigned to the current interface can be managed. To see other resources, the management application have to change the current interface.

kcprtMemoryDeviceType.name: kcprtMemoryDeviceType
kcprtMemoryDeviceType.description: The value shows the type of this memory device.

kcprtMemoryDeviceTotalSize.name: kcprtMemoryDeviceTotalSize
kcprtMemoryDeviceTotalSize.description: The maximum space of the memory device. Unit is bytes.

kcprtMemoryDeviceUsedSize.name: kcprtMemoryDeviceUsedSize
kcprtMemoryDeviceUsedSize.description: The amount of occupied space on the device. Unit is bytes. If the device cannot detect the amount, the value is (-1).

kcprtMemoryDeviceStatus.name: kcprtMemoryDeviceStatus
kcprtMemoryDeviceStatus.description: This value shows current status of this device. not accessible means that the printer recognized the device but the access is impossible. battery low is for a kind of battery backuped device, such as IC-card.

kcprtPartitionTable.name: kcprtPartitionTable
kcprtPartitionTable.description: This table contains partition information for each device.

kcprtPartitionEntry.name: kcprtPartitionEntry
kcprtPartitionEntry.description: A list of entries that is corresponding to the each information about the partition.

kcprtPartitionIndex.name: kcprtPartitionIndex
kcprtPartitionIndex.description: A unique value corresponding to the each partition on the printer's memory device. This assigment will change in some cases.

kcprtPartitionSize.name: kcprtPartitionSize
kcprtPartitionSize.description: This value shows the size of this partition. Unit is byte.

kcprtPartitionLocation.name: kcprtPartitionLocation
kcprtPartitionLocation.description: This value of kcprtMemoryDeviceIndex corresponding to the device on which this partition exists. If the device is unknown, this value is (-1).

kcprtPartitionResourceType.name: kcprtPartitionResourceType
kcprtPartitionResourceType.description: The type of the resource that is using this partition.

kcprtPartitionName.name: kcprtPartitionName
kcprtPartitionName.description: The name that is assigned to this partition.

kcprtPartitionLoad.name: kcprtPartitionLoad
kcprtPartitionLoad.description: This value shows whether this partition has been read by the printer. basically, the resource should be read by the printer to make it available.

kcprtMacroDataTable.name: kcprtMacroDataTable
kcprtMacroDataTable.description: This table contains information about MACRO resource.

kcprtMacroDataName.name: kcprtMacroDataName
kcprtMacroDataName.description: This value will be effective if the macro is described in Prescribe. Otherwise, this value will be NULL.

kcprtMacroDataID.name: kcprtMacroDataID
kcprtMacroDataID.description: This value will be effective if the macro is described in PCL. Otherwise, the value will be unknown(-1).

kcprtMacroDataType.name: kcprtMacroDataType
kcprtMacroDataType.description: This value is corresponding to the PDL that is used for decribing this macro.

kcprtMacroDataAutoLoad.name: kcprtMacroDataAutoLoad
kcprtMacroDataAutoLoad.description: This value shows the state of the form overlay function that is controled by AMCR command. Only one macro can be set as on, so at most one entry will have on value.

kcprtMacroDataLocation.name: kcprtMacroDataLocation
kcprtMacroDataLocation.description: The value of kcprtMemoryDeviceIndex correspinding to the device that this macro is currently stored. unknown is (-1).

kcprtMacroDataAttribute.name: kcprtMacroDataAttribute
kcprtMacroDataAttribute.description: not registered means this resource is existing on the device but it is not available for the printer. For example, macro on the IC card that is inserted into the printer after turning on will be not registered. To turn it into registered, user must select them from the front panel menu.

kcprtHostDataTable.name: kcprtHostDataTable
kcprtHostDataTable.description: This table contains information about the host data. Note that 'Host data' does not mean the job itself.

kcprtHostDataEntry.name: kcprtHostDataEntry
kcprtHostDataEntry.description: A list of entries that are corresponding each information of the host data.

kcprtHostDataIndex.name: kcprtHostDataIndex
kcprtHostDataIndex.description: A unique value corresponding to each information of the host data. The assigment will change in some case.

kcprtHostDataName.name: kcprtHostDataName
kcprtHostDataName.description: The name that is used for descriminating each host data.

kcprtHostDataLocation.name: kcprtHostDataLocation
kcprtHostDataLocation.description: The value of kcprtMemoryDeviceIndex that is corresponding to the device in which this host data is stored. If the device is unknown, the value is -1.

kcprtHostDataAttribute.name: kcprtHostDataAttribute
kcprtHostDataAttribute.description: Basically, the value is always registered.

kcprtProgramDataTable.name: kcprtProgramDataTable
kcprtProgramDataTable.description: This table contains information about the program data. The program data is a kind of emulation and a Prescribe command, not a macro.

kcprtProgramDataEntry.name: kcprtProgramDataEntry
kcprtProgramDataEntry.description: A list of entries that are corresponding to each information of the program data.

kcprtProgramDataIndex.name: kcprtProgramDataIndex
kcprtProgramDataIndex.description: A unique value corresponding to each program data. This assigment may change in some case.

kcprtProgramDataLocation.name: kcprtProgramDataLocation
kcprtProgramDataLocation.description: The value of kcprtMemoryDeviceIndex corresponding to the device in which this program data is stored. If the device is unknown, the value is (-1).

kcprtProgramDataAttribute.name: kcprtProgramDataAttribute
kcprtProgramDataAttribute.description: running means the program is running.

kcprtMessageDataTable.name: kcprtMessageDataTable
kcprtMessageDataTable.description: This is a bunch of message that is handled as one of the flont panel language by the printer.

kcprtMessageDataEntry.name: kcprtMessageDataEntry
kcprtMessageDataEntry.description: A list of entries that are corresponding to each information of the message data.

kcprtMessageDataIndex.name: kcprtMessageDataIndex
kcprtMessageDataIndex.description: The index vaule that is assigned to each front panel language.

kcprtMessageDataName.name: kcprtMessageDataName
kcprtMessageDataName.description: The name of the message data block.

kcprtMessageDataLocation.name: kcprtMessageDataLocation
kcprtMessageDataLocation.description: The value of kcprtMemoryDeviceIndex corresponding to the device in which this message data is stored. If the device is unknown, the value is -1.

kcprtMessageDataAttribute.name: kcprtMessageDataAttribute
kcprtMessageDataAttribute.description: Always registered in the current products.

kcprtFontDataEntry.name: kcprtFontDataEntry
kcprtFontDataEntry.description: A list of entries that are corresponding each information of the font.

kcprtFontDataIndex.name: kcprtFontDataIndex
kcprtFontDataIndex.description: A unique value corresponding to each font data. The assignment may change in some case.

kcprtTypeFaceName.name: kcprtTypeFaceName
kcprtTypeFaceName.description: The value will be NULL if no name has been assigned.

kcprtFontID.name: kcprtFontID
kcprtFontID.description: This value will be -1 if no ID has been assigned.

kcprtFontLocation.name: kcprtFontLocation
kcprtFontLocation.description: The value of kcprtMemoryDeviceIndex corresponding to the device on which this font is stored. If it is unknown, the value is -1.

kcprtFontAttribute.name: kcprtFontAttribute
kcprtFontAttribute.description: In the current printer, this value is always registered.
